message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $14,000?
